xml:
That's me trying to explain my research to my dog. As I found out, communicating research (and why it is useful) is difficult. I built this web app to make some interesting results from my PhD research accessible beyond the scientific papers.
The visualisations on this website result from the first two chapters of my PhD thesis, which I defended succesfully on 28 November 2019:
I hope you like it! If you have any questions or something does (not) work for you, get in touch or leave a message ! :)
Cheers,
Koen
About the author Koen Berends is a researcher at the independent institute for applied research Deltares. He has a masters degree in civil engineering and obtained his PhD degree from the University of Twente for his dissertation on the uncertainty of prediction models that are used for (large scale) human intervention in rivers.
